Minneapolis.Minnesota Streetcar Museum:
The Minnesota Streetcar Museum (MSM) is a transport museum that operates two heritage streetcar lines in Minneapolis, Minnesota and the western suburb of Excelsior.


== Museum ==
The Museum was created as a result of the restructuring of the Minnesota Transportation Museum (MTM) during the winter of 2004-2005. The MTM was founded in 1962 to restore a streetcar, Twin City Rapid Transit Company No.
